testcase.name: When I send POST request to create a new booking with firstName"Abc", lastName"Xyz", totalprice "550", depositpaid "yes", checkin "2023-02-18", checkout"2023-06-05" additionalneeds "Breakfast"
Then I verify that new booking is created by id
And I send a Put request with firstName"Abc", lastName"Xyz", totalprice "550", depositpaid "yes", checkin "2023-02-18", checkout"2023-06-05" additionalneeds "Breakfast"
And The totalprice "550" is successfully updated
And I send delete booking by id
Then The booking is successfully deleted from the record
When I send POST request to create a new booking with firstName"Mno", lastName"Pqr", totalprice "700", depositpaid "No", checkin "2023-05-05", checkout"2023-12-20" additionalneeds "Dinner"
Then I verify that new booking is created by id
And I send a Put request with firstName"Mno", lastName"Pqr", totalprice "700", depositpaid "No", checkin "2023-05-05", checkout"2023-12-20" additionalneeds "Dinner"
And The totalprice "700" is successfully updated
And I send delete booking by id
Then The booking is successfully deleted from the record
